amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in House Report 116-6 to amend the bill to specifically include Military Sexual Trauma counseling and care services under section 1720D of title 38 in the definition of covered health care services.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sherrill amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A020) offered by Ms. Sherrill.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sherrill amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
